item.title: I’m a TV reviewer, and these are the 4 Black Friday OLED TV deals I recommend

item.title: Pluribus episode 4 introduces us to a mysterious new character – and I think they're key to solving the Apple TV show's big riddle
item.description: The fourth episode of Pluribus includes a big character reveal – here's why they might be important to solving The Joining.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for November 21, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for November 21, 2025
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.
